item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Nonjas are primarily village fillers. Each one counts as being in your village when it comes to # of Ninjas needed to maintain Upgrades. If the villager count drops below the requirement, the Upgrade receives Damage, and will eventually be destroyed if the damage isn't repaired before it runs out of HP.

Nonjas also count as Collecting for the day, increasing the chance of finding Resources.

Lastly, with the Nonja Lab upgrade, you can destroy a Nonja in order to open up a Zombja map for the village.
